simplified: 小隐隐于野，大隐隐于市

pronunciation.pinyin: xiǎo yǐn yǐn yú yě , dà yǐn yǐn yú shì
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: xiao3 yin3 yin3 yu2 ye3 , da4 yin3 yin3 yu2 shi4

details.simplified: 小隐隐于野，大隐隐于市
details.traditional: 小隱隱於野，大隱隱於市

meanings.value: an ordinary hermit lives in the seclusion of the wild; the true recluse chooses the city
